At-a-Glance: UK law requires accurate records for treatments, feed, and honey sales.
Why it Matters: Supports traceability for consumers and auditors.
Step-by-Step: 1) Maintain medicine log with dates, products, doses.
2) Record feed types and quantities per colony.
3) Track honey extraction volumes and batch codes.
Safety & Compliance: Required under UK Veterinary Medicines Regulations.
